alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 05 at 2:39PM PDT until May 05 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the rest of Thursday, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph with similar conditions expected Friday. * WHERE...Humboldt County, Northern Elko County, Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County and Southwest Elko County. * WHEN... Until 9 PM PDT this evening with the second Wind Advisory from 11 AM to 9 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust could reduce visibility down to a mile or less making travel difficult at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust is expected alongside these strong winds. Look for visibility to be greatly reduce at times, especially around the I-80 and US-50 corridors.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County
